item.description:
Type 8 Director Workshop - also How to Relate to 8s

Learn everything about Type 8, subtypes of 8, growth and development for 8s, how to relate to 8s and 8s to other types. Perfect for 8s, anyone in relationship to a 8 or who wants to learn more about 8s.

6:00 pm - 8:30 pm

Traditional cost $40 - Sliding scale to $20

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram expert, has taught 2000 Enneagram workshops and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram. Herb uses the Enneagram is his therapy practice for individuals, couples and families. He is also an organizational trainer and teaches the Enneagram to companies for team building.

www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Type 8 Director Workshop - also How to Relate to 8s
